uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content

Class BlockContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.AbstractContexed
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content.BlockContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UIGenerator, Contexed

    public class BlockContent
extends AbstractContexed
implements UIGenerator
    A wrapper to convert PreDefinedContent into an AppContext so it can be loaded as a plugin. For exmaple on the login page
